class.name: MediaPipeNormalizedKeypoint
class.description: A keypoint, defined by the coordinates (x, y), normalized by the image dimensions.

method.name: has_label
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the keypoint has [member label].

method.name: has_score
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the keypoint has [member score].

method.name: make_vector_proto_packet
method.description: Creates a [MediaPipePacket] that contains a vector of [code]mediapipe::LocationData::RelativeKeypoint[/code]s.

members.member: The optional label of the keypoint.
The convenient property to get [member x] and [member y] as [Vector2].
The optional score of the keypoint.
The x coordinate of the keypoint.
The y coordinate of the keypoint.
